name: BroadBased
description:
From traditional to digital, if it’s related to marketing, it’s in our genes. BroadBased Communications helps growth-minded organizations bridge the digital divide and incorporate new marketing technologies and platforms into legacy marketing programs.
With more than 20 years in the business, we have the experience to generate more leads from traditional marketing channels and the vision to incorporate content marketing approaches that build brand loyalty with sophisticated consumers in the digital age. BroadBased offers a full complement of marketing capabilities, from comprehensive integrated marketing plans to a wide range of creative projects, including custom-designed responsive websites, marketing brochures, social media strategies and brand development. Our experience also spans diverse industries, including transportation, manufacturing, IT, staffing, higher education, healthcare, finance and more. The point is, we have the depth of knowledge to craft industry-specific solutions related to market image and stakeholder messaging. And rest assured that no matter how big or how small your needs may be, you’ll get our best effort every time.
